verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I wonder if I'll ever find my way
I wonder if my life could really change
At all

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
All this earth
Could all that is lost ever be found
Could a garden come up from this ground
At all

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
You make beaytiful things
You make beaytiful things out of the dust
You make beaytiful things
You make beaytiful things out of us

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
All around
Hope is sringing up from this old ground
Out of chaos life is being found
In You

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
You make me new You are making me new
You make me new You are making me new
